title: SOLD - T205 Snodgrass - Sovereign Back - No Decimal Variation
author: Eggoman

posts.post_title: SOLD - T205 Snodgrass - Sovereign Back - No Decimal Variation
posts.post_content:
Hello All!

Availablle for your consideration is this T205 Snodgrass – Sovereign Reverse with the Lesser Known “NO DECIMAL POINT BEFORE 405” Variation.  (NOTE:  The card with the Hassan reverse is NOT included, but helps show the variations.  I know that you knew that!)

Ok, ok, it’s a “SUBTLE” variation, but if the “Mathewson Cycle Reverse with 1 Win” Variation counts, then this one should too!

Anyway, here it is.  In MY opinion, it’s in GOOD condition with a FAINT crease under Fred’s nose.

In my opinion, it measures correctly for the issue and has not been trimmed or “doctored” in any way!

Please message me if you are interested.  "A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.”  (I stole that phraseology from someone, but I DO like it!)

$95.00, delivered, PayPal – Friends or Family OR “Regular” PayPal + 3%!

Thank you for your consideration!
When and who made this discovery?  Has anyone posted about it yet?

The Snodgrass no-decimal was shown in this Net54 post from 2016:
[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=1504604[/url]
Mr. Snodgrass has been sold - THANKS FOR ALL THE INTEREST!
